text:
Halaman parkir hotel tidak terlalu luas, lobby kecil tapi ada kursi untuk menunggu saat proses check in. 
Proses check in cepat, front office officer ramah. 
Lorong hotel agak gelap karena saat check in sudah malam. 
Kamar bersih dan cukup luas untuk ukuran hotel kecil. 
Ada kursi dan meja plus coffee and tea maker jadi bisa bikin kopi pas bangun pagi. 
Disediakan 2 botol air minum. 
Overall untuk kamar bagus dan nyaman untuk istirahat. 
Makan pagi kurang bagus karena tidak ada cereal, buah hanya ada semangka. 
Menu pilihan tidak banyak, saat saya menginap ada bubur,  nasi putih dan nasi goreng, mie goreng serta 1 sayur dan otak otak. 
Roti dan mesing panggang plus coffee machine ada.
Restoran bersih dan pelayanan staf ramah dan juga cepat. 

Nilai lebih dari hotel ini adalah, nyaman dan bersih untuk menginap baik untuk pasangan, sendiri atau keluarga. 
Staf hotel ramah dan cepat. 

Koreksi saya untuk hotel ini, mungkin bisa sediakan cereal untuk sarapan pagi karena banyak turis domestik atau manca negara yang perlu cereal untuk sarapan pagi mengingat kebutuhan diet atau pribadi masing masing. 
Handuk mandi mungkin bisa diberi pewangi agar lebih harum. 
Alat mandi didalam kamar mandi ada sikat gigi dan sabun, tapi alangkah lebih baik bisa membawa sendiri. 
Poto kamar, lobby dan resro sama seperti di iklan. 
Saya tidak menambahkan karena semua poto sesuai pada saat saya menginap. 

Rekomendasi saya buat hotel ini baik dan bagus, boleh dijadikan pilihan saat perlu hotel di daerah jimbaran.
title: Bagus

text:
The location may not be perfect, depending on what it is you're looking to be close to, but it worked for my purposes, so provided the proximity to the beach, etc works for you, it's a great option.

It's brand-new, clean and air-tight (as in, none of those doors or windows which don't properly close) letting in bugs and geckos, so you can rest easy if you aren't ok with geckos in your room, like me! It's very simple...no fridge, no shampoo, but that was not a problem for me.

Breakfast was very well presented and the area kept clean, which I think is incredibly important. They didn't have much for vegans, but kindly provided me with white rice and I ate the vegetables with it, which was perfectly adequate. A vegan Nasi Goreng would be a great addition.

The one real problem I encountered was that on the back side of the building is a compound where the family has tons of dogs. One of them does not ever stop barking and sometimes all of them are barking. It is unbearable. I tried many times to politely get the family's attention, so that I could ask them to please take the dogs inside or something, but I couldn't seem to get their attention. I felt bad because that's their home, but at the same time the barking was horrible and started early in the morning and went on until late at night, presumably when they let the dogs into the house. It wOuld improve your guests stay if the hotel could come to some kind of agreement with the faMily regarding the disturbance caused by the dogs' barking.

I hope that this hotel can maintain a good standard and not let their hotel get worn down over time, because I would definitely come back if they maintain a clean hotel, so these are the things which I think need improvement now...

Improvements for breakfast:
-Don't serve coffee and tea in jugs that sit on the warmer. That is not the proper way to serve tea at all and it stews the coffee and makes it taste bad. You also cannot put Balinese coffee with the grounds in a jug like that....that is for filtered coffee only. Fresh Balinese coffee is really the best, but if you can't provide that, filtered coffee in an urn is better. Regarding tea, it is better to provide hot water in an urn with tea bags and let people make their own tea, so that the tea is fresh.
-For some reason all the guests dig their hands into the rice cracker jar, which is very unhygienic. I think you should have a sign which indicates not to use hands

Improvements for room:
-daily cLeaning needs to include cleaning the floors in the room and bathroom. I got a lot of sand on the bathroom floor from my clothes after being at the beach. This was not even swept up during the daily clean.

Staff and hotel improvements:
-staff were lovely, but they don't have much knowledge of the area
-a lot of the staff have very limited English, so asking questions is difficult. I wouldn't hold this against them at all, but helping them to continue to improve their English would be beneficial
-staff should provide taxis which are not the official zuri express transport, because I believe that is overpriced and that person is not always available, so other options would be welcome
title: Very pleased, brand new and pleasant

text:
I stayed at Zuri Express on October 2022 due to bussines trip. The hotel was located in Jimbaran area, a lot of shops/restaurants nearby. 
Check in process was easy, but none of staff offering to help our luggage. The room key was limited. They couldnt give an extra key room, even I try to pay more.
The room was clean, they provided standard amenities, 2 water bottles. Unfortunately, the 1st night, I slept in a smoking room (which's I had beed requested for non smoking roon). Then I told reservation team, and they said their room was full, and asking me to try again in the next morning. The next morning, they gave me a non smoking room, and the room faced to GWK statue! Perfect!
This hotel provided swimming pool. The pool was great, whether it's not big. The other point is, when I asked for pool towel, the staff at the restaurant gave me a wet pool. I didn't know why the towel was wet, is it because of the rain and the towel became wet or is it used towel?!
Overall, it's budget hotel and recommended, but they have to make a little improvement in some aspects.

text: This is a nice, budget hotel in central South Bali - Jimbaran area. It has all the amenities you could ask for, both in the room and outside (breakfast area, pool, lounges, etc.) offered at a very reasonable price. The staff was bilingual and very friendly, the rooms large, new, and tastefully designed. There are excellent views of the surrounding areas from the upper floors and a number of convenience stores, warungs, and restaurants in the immediate area. The only real complaint was location. The hotel is a good 30-40 minute walk from Jimbaran beach. Most of the walk is on quiet residential alleys/roads and is not a huge hassle. However, if you are looking for a beachfront experience - or even close to a beachfront experience - this hotel is not it. But if you are willing to walk a little ways (which is a good way to see the area anyway), then this is an excellent budget option without sacrificing comfort and amenities.
title: Nice budget hotel some distance from beach

text:
Zuri Express Jimbaran Bali is my preferred budget hotel in Jimbaran as it is relatively new, clean and staff friendly and accomodating. 

I live in Bali and use Zuri Express Jimbaran Bali when my villa is booked. There is plenty of budget hotels in Jimbaran but for the price, cleanliness, ammenities and location to popular tourist destinations like GWK, Uluwatu, Nusa Dua and of course Jimbaran Beach, I truly believe that Zuri Express Jimbaran Bali cannot be beaten for these reasons.

The rooms are clean, spacious and accomodating equipped with Air-conditioning, Satellite TV and Wifi internet. The bathroom is modern with a hot water shower and western style toilet. Complimentary Tea, Coffee and Bottle Water and daily housekeeping / turnover service like any other hotel. 

I recommend requesting or staying in the Superior room during your stay as the standard room can be a tight squeeze if you are seeking to use the room for business as there is limited desk space for laptops but there is meeting rooms or the restaurant area if require more space.

The Wifi whilst fast and reliable can be slow a times depending on the number of guests in the hotel. The Satellite TV has a few English speaking channels including Western movie channels. The walls are thin so if you are light sleeper this could be a problem but for the price of the room and amenities you can easily overlook these aspects of your stay.

The restaurant onsite accommodates mostly a Chinese based menu due to the core demographic of their guests being tour groups from China. They do offer daily breakfast service depending on the room package you have booked and room service, lunch and dinner is also available at the hotel.

Free basement parking is available for both car and motorcycle which is great during your stay and onsite 24 hour security and maintenance teams if any issues arise.

I would personally like to thank the following team members: Pasek, Lutvia, Andre, Diane and the rest of the front desk, F &B and Management teams at Zuri Express for their service and their ability to go above and beyond for a frequent guest like myself at their hotel. It is hard to find such lovely, English speaking and accomodating staff like this at a major hotel chain. 

Thank you again for looking after me each and every time. See you again soon!

Mr Kavit.
title: Budget Price, Accomodating English Speaking Staff and Newly Built Hotel in Jimbaran
